resources.name: GET - Dream Meaning Article
resources.description: Fetches a specific dream article based on the provided language, category, and slug. Returns the article's metadata and content in a structured format.

resources.name: AnalyzeMyDream API
resources.description:
AnalyzeMyDream is an **Astro-based project** designed to explore dream meanings and enhance self-understanding. It leverages AI-powered dream interpretation alongside research-backed bibliographic sources, all integrated with a comprehensive API.

### API Integration Guide & Example Usage

To start using the API, first obtain your API key. You can generate your API key and find detailed instructions on integrating each endpoint into your application by visiting the [AnalyzeMyDream API Reference & Documentation](https://analyzemydream.com/api). This resource also includes specific usage examples, request structures, expected responses, and exemplo de códigos in various programming languages. The API supports multiple languages, making it versatile for international users.

resources.name: POST - Fast-AI Dream Analyzer
resources.description: Submit a single dream description to our Fast-AI Dream Analyzer. This endpoint processes the description based on the provided language and returns a clear, formatted analysis of the dream's content.

resources.name: POST - Advanced-AI Dream Analyzer Copy
resources.description: Submit a detailed dream description to our Advanced-AI Dream Analyzer, which uses predefined parameters based on extensive research and statistical patterns. The analysis provided is comprehensive, considering additional insights to offer a more in-depth understanding of the dream.

body.text:
{
  "dream_description": "I found myself in a bustling office environment, surrounded by colleagues engaged in various tasks. The space was filled with the hum of activity and the clatter of keyboards. I was working on an important project, collaborating with a team to meet tight deadlines. Despite the stress, I felt a sense of accomplishment and purpose as I tackled challenges and contributed to the project’s success. The dream left me with a feeling of determination and a greater appreciation for teamwork and professional achievements.",
  "lang": "en",
  "dream_type": "Lucid",
  "dream_importance": "Very Important",
  "main_emotions": "N/A",
  "dream_context": "Unknown",
  "dream_state": "Refreshed",
  "dream_frequency": "Always",
  "dream_expectations": "Personal Insight"
}

resources.name: POST - Custom-AI Dream Analyzer
resources.description: Submit a dream description along with user-defined custom parameters to our Custom-AI Dream Analyzer. This endpoint allows you to tailor the analysis based on specific parameters you define, providing a personalized and detailed analysis of the dream.

resources.name: POST - Comparative-AI Dream Analyzer
resources.description: Submit two separate dream descriptions to our Comparative-AI Dream Analyzer. This endpoint performs a detailed comparative analysis, highlighting similarities and differences between the two dreams, and returns a formatted result of the comparison.

resources.name: POST - Batch-AI Dream Analyzer
resources.description: Submit a batch of up to three dream descriptions to our Batch AI Dream Analyzer. This endpoint processes all provided dreams and returns a consolidated analysis, offering insights into the collective data of multiple dreams.

resources.name: GET - Random Dream Meanings Articles
resources.description: Fetches 5 random dream articles based on the provided language. Returns a list of articles with their metadata and content in a structured format.

resources.name: GET - Slugs
resources.description: Fetches a list of slugs usado as identifiers for 'Dream Meanings' articles, returning the content as a JSON list.

resources.name: GET - Langs
resources.description: Fetches a list of languages available for the dream articles, returning the content as a JSON list.

resources.name: GET - Categories
resources.description: Fetches a list of categories usado in the dream articles, returning the content as a JSON list.

resources.name: GET - All Endpoints (English)
resources.description: Fetches a list of endpoints available in English for 'Dream Meanings' articles, returning the content as a JSON list.

resources.name: GET - All Endpoints (Portuguese)
resources.description: Fetches a list of endpoints available in Portuguese for 'Dream Meanings' articles, returning the content as a JSON list.

resources.name: GET - All Endpoints (Spanish)
resources.description: Fetches a list of endpoints available in Spanish for 'Dream Meanings' articles, returning the content as a JSON list.
